name: Neuro-Synchronized Reactive Shell
description: This sleek exosuit harnesses advanced neural interface technology to adapt its defenses in real time based on incoming threats. The wearer feels a subtle hum as the suit's plating shifts and hardens.

flavor.rationale: Developed for elite security forces, this armor was designed to provide maximum protection without sacrificing mobility or reaction time. It uses experimental neuro-linked sensors to anticipate attacks before they happen, allowing it to harden critical areas just milliseconds before impact.
